name: Banana Muffin Mug 🥗
description: Whip up a delightful Banana Muffin Mug in just minutes, perfect for satisfying those sudden cravings. This fluffy, moist treat is a game-changer for busy mornings or late-night snacking.
instructions: Mix together egg white and honey in a greased coffee mug.
Add oat flour, baking powder, and cinnamon, and mix until combined.
Microwave on high for 90 seconds (times may vary).
